# oss-terminal copy - AI Handbook

*Generated by Micracode on 2026-01-14 16:15*

---

## Overview

This is the oss-terminal copy project.

## Tech Stack

**Languages:** Python
**Frameworks:** LangChain (LLM toolkit), LangGraph (AI agent framework), Textual (TUI framework)
**Tools:** pyproject.toml (modern Python packaging), uv (package manager)

## Directory Structure

```

├── agent/
```

## Key Files

- **`main.py`** - Main application entry point
- **`test.py`** - Test/development entry point
- **`README.md`** - Project documentation
- **`pyproject.toml`** - Python project configuration
- **`.gitignore`** - Git ignore rules

## Architecture & Patterns

- Component-based architecture
- Tools/plugins pattern for extensibility
- AI agent architecture
- Configuration separated from code
- LLM integration layer
